transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: Or call has been forwarded to voicemail, the person.

Speaker B: Call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please record your message. When you have finished recording, you may hang up.
Speaker A: Hi Yemen, this is Hussain. I'm calling regarding your accommodation. I'm calling from the University of University College London and powered by Amber and we are looking to connect with you from a few days. Can you please let me know when you're available so we can connect on the call and we can get back? Thank you so much.

Speaker A: Call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please record your message. When you have finished recording, you may hang up.
Speaker B: Hi, Amen, this is Hussain. I'm calling from your accommodation portal. I was trying to reach you out regarding your accommodation from UCL accommodation portal by Amber. Can you please call me back on this number or you can revert over WhatsApp so I can help you out with your accommodation. Thank you so much. Take care.

Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Hi.
Speaker A: Hi, I'm speaking with Yamin. Yeah, this is Rachana calling on behalf of University College London.
Speaker B: So you know my accommodation? I've already sorted out my accommodation. I've got student accommodation, so I don't need any private accommodation. Thank you.
Speaker A: Sure. You got it from where?
Speaker B: UCL itself. I've got private accommodation. I've got a student accommodation.
Speaker A: I'm calling on behalf of UCR itself. I am, actually, regarding the accommodation. So have you, like, booked it already or you're searching about it?
Speaker B: I've already booked one. It's at Langton Close. I've already booked an accommodation and everything. Paid deposit, everything.
Speaker A: Okay, perfect. Sounds good. Thank you.
Speaker B: Thank you. Bye.
